entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
